thing.name: Shell Shock
thing.description: The character begins the first round of combat Shaken. The status can be removed as normal

thing.name: Shakes
thing.description: Whenever the character fails a Spirit roll, they must take a Vigor roll. If this is failed, they begin to have a seizure

thing.name: Owned
thing.description: The character owes such a massive debt to someone that they have little say over what the owner tells them to do

thing.name: Racist (Minor)
thing.description: The character has -2 Charisma among other races

thing.name: Racist (Major)
thing.description: The character has -4 Charisma among other races
